FuncDef: The reset mpls te auto-tunnel p2mp command restarts a specified automatic P2MP TE tunnel.
CLIs: reset mpls te auto-tunnel p2mp name <tunnel-name>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a tunnel interface.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset mpls te auto-tunnel p2mp name P2MP132769
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If errors occur in services transmitted on an automatic P2MP TE tunnel and the services cannot be restored, run the reset mpls te auto-tunnel p2mp command in the user view to reestablish the P2MP TE tunnel to restore the services.
Configuration Impact
After this command is run, all LSPs in the specified tunnel are torn down and reestablished.
